mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(bno, writer, content) value(#{bno}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set writer = #{writer}, content = #{content} where rno = #{rno} and bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_reply where rno = #{rno} and bno = ${bno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, writer, content, regDate from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} and rno = #{rno}
